game.name: Dog Simulator Puppy Craft
game.description:
Dog Simulator: Puppy Craft is a 3D action-packed free online game in which you will get a chance to play with multiple adorable puppies. Your objective in this brand new game is to scratch carpets, catch mice when you see along the way and do not forget to destroy vases and mess food. Whether you have a pet or not, these cute companions are going to join you in this cute exciting adventures around the house.

Key Features:

  • Interactive Puppy Play: Get yourself ready to engage in lovely playful activities with the help of your virtual puppies, right from scratching carpets to chasing mice and causing cute mischiefs around the house. It will be amazing to experience the joy of bonding with your awesome companions as you go on a variety of entertaining tasks together.
  • Explore the House: You have to focus on how to navigate successfully through different rooms of the house. Each room offers unique environments and interactive elements for you and your puppies to discover. Right from the living room to the kitchen, there is plenty of things to explore and interact with as you unleash your playful side.
  • Complete Crazy Tasks: Plenty of exciting missions and crazy tasks to explore throughout the house. From destroying vases to messing with food and scratching furniture, we can say that there is no shortage of fun challenges to tackle with your mischievous puppies by your side. Test your skills and see how many tasks you can complete in this delightful doggy adventure!

      • Well, you are going to experience the unforgettable journey with adorable virtual puppies in this one of the best platform games for boys and girls. Are you ready to play, cuddle, and explore with your hairy companions?
